title: Healthy plate: simple portion guide
summary: Half veggies, quarter protein, quarter whole grains. Add water or unsweetened tea.

title: When to seek urgent care for a headache
summary: Worst-ever headache, stiff neck, confusion, new weakness or vision change need urgent evaluation.

title: Diabetes & walking
summary: A 20â€“30 minute walk after meals can help lower post-meal glucose spikes.

title: Blood pressure at home
summary: Measure at the same times daily, seated, back supported, arm at heart level, and record readings.
